lines.text: I'm starving. No food in months. It's discouraging, that's what it is. Why, I ain't eaten in so long, even my stomach is talking back to me. Listen.

[echoing]
Send down one hamburger, everything on it!
You see what I mean? Hey, Joe, when's the last time you ate?
Are you kidding?
[opens mouth; it has cobwebs and a sign that reads, "Closed for the Duration"]
What I wouldn't give to sink my teeth into a big, thick, juicy T-bone steak, with gravy oozing out of it.
[picture of steak appears onscreen]
3 minute intermission for drooling. The Management.
I'm so hungry, I could eat...
[sees Joe as a roast chicken]
...anything.

[sees other vulture as roast chicken also]
Yeah, me too.
Hey, Joe. What are you trying to do, eat me?
Nah, pal. I was only kidding. I couldn't eat you even if I wanted to, on account of this bad tooth I got. Here, take a look at this cavity. right there, way in the back. See? Way in the back.

[sticks head into Joe's mouth]
I don't see nothing, Joe.
[Joe bites down; Jimmy looks as if he's headless, but head soon pops back out]
What a repulsive way to make a living.
Hey, Joe. I can't do it. I'm all washed up. One of us has got to die, then it might as well be me.
[gives Joe a cleaver and puts head in chopping block]
Okay, Joe. Go ahead. You can kill me.
[Joe strikes with cleaver; Jimmy retracts head]
You know, Joe? I believe you would, too.
